texts.en: Salim is a resident of the city of Istaravshan.  He is involved in sowing agricultural crops for sale.  He primarily hires dekhan farmers to sow and grow vegetables.  He has a large plot of land.  Salim has been in this business for twenty years.  He is 51 years old, married and has four children.  He is requesting this loan to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Nounagnon Group

texts.fr: Le groupement NOUNAGNON est composé de quinze personnes qui mènent toutes des activités génératrices de revenus et habitent le même village. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupement sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante de ce groupement, du nom de Lucie Constance est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Lucie Constance est âgée de 40 ans et est mariée à un certain Justin. Lucie Constance est mère de quatre enfants tous scolarisés, dont un à sa charge. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assurées par le couple. Pour y parvenir, Lucie Constance mène comme activité, la vente de divers produits (ananas, farine de manioc) au Bénin. De façon secondaire, Lucie Constance vend de la nourriture (riz, pâte de maïs) dans son quartier. Lucie Constance exerce cette activité depuis une vingtaine d’année et s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Lucie Constance sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement NOUNAGNON, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The group NOUNAGNON comprises fifteen persons who all have revenue-generating businesses and who live in the same village. This is the second time this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé to boost their business. 

The group's representative, Lucie Constance, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 40 years old and married to a man named Justin. Lucie Constance is the mother of four children, all in school. One of the children is in her care. 

The diverse household expenses are covered by the couple. To do so, Lucie Constance runs a business selling various goods (pineapple, cassava flour) in Benin. Secondarily, she sells food (rice, polenta) in her district. She has been in this business for about twenty years and gets her supplies in Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and her revenues, Lucie Constance, along with the other members of the group NOUNAGNON, is requesting a second loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy a sacks of rice and about forty pineapples

loans.name: Leslie Antonia Mendoza Munguia

texts.es: Leslie Antonia tiene 29 años de edad, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general esta actividad la realiza de forma ambulante visita a sus clientes a los cuales les ofrece los productos, tiene años de experiencia en el negocio por esa razón los clientes la visitan. La emprendedora  inicio con esfuerzo propio con ahorros de  lo que su esposo le daba para los gastos del hogar, y poder  emprender su negocio. Leslie Antonia está solicitando financiamiento para comprar mayor productos y tener mayor clientela y mantener productos para dar repuesta al instante a sus clientes con el crédito comprara blusas, camisas, pantalones, zapatos, perfumes, variedad de cosméticos entre otros productos.
texts.en: Leslie Antonia is 29 years old. She is a street vendor, selling a variety of products. She goes visit her customers to whom she sells her products, and her customers buy form her because of her many years of experience in this field. This entrepreneur started her activity thanks to her own efforts, using the money she had saved form the amounts received from her husband to pay for their household expenses; this is how she has been able to invest in her activity. Leslie Antonia is requesting a loan to buy more products, to gain more customers and to stock up her inventory in order to promptly satisfy her customer’s requests. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy blouses, shirts, trousers, shoes, perfumes and a variety of cosmetics among other products.

loans.use: To buy blouses, shirts, trousers, shoes, perfumes and a variety of cosmetics.

loans.name: Xiomara Arely

texts.es:
Xiomara, quiere seguir invirtiendo en el negocio, por esta razón está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para elaborar pupusas, como maíz, condimentos, quesillo, chicharrón, gaseosas, jugos con lo que pretende fortalecerse y generar mayores ganancias para la familia.
Ella ha tenido un efecto positivo del préstamo anterior, invirtiendo siempre en el negocio para poder prosperar junto a su familia, por quienes se esfuerza para que sus necesidades sean solventadas.
texts.en:
Xiomara wants to continue investing in the business and this is why she’s asking for a loan to buy materials to make pupusas [grilled stuffed corncakes] like corn, condiments, cheese, fried pork, soft-drinks and juice in order to strengthen and generate more family income.

She’s had a positive effect from her previous loan always investing in the business in order to make progress together with her family who she strives for so that their needs will be met.

loans.use: to buy corn, condiments, cheese, fried pork, soft-drinks and juices.

loans.name: Gloria Elizabeth

texts.es:
Gloria, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de productos para la elaboración de comidas, como carnes, pollo, arroz, aceite, tomates, cebollas, sal, condimentos, para preparar los platillos para los clientes, esto le ayudara para mantenerse y seguir trabajando por mejorar su situación económica.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo para mejorar la producción de comida, ayudándole para que sus clientes se mantengan en el negocio y poder tener mayores ventas.
texts.en:
Gloria is asking for a new loan to buy ingredients to prepare food with like meats, chicken, rice, oil, tomatoes, onions, salt and condiments to prepare dishes for customers.  This will help her support herself and continue working to improve her economic situation.

She feels that the previous loan helped her improve food production helping her so that her customers would continue coming to her business and be able to have higher sales.

loans.use: to buy meats, chicken, rice, oil, tomatoes, salt and condiments.

loans.name: Jyambere--Muhinzi /mrr /bgrm Group

texts.fr:
Théobald fait partie du groupe Jyambere Muhinzi/Mrr/Bgrm. Il a 25 ans, il est célibataire. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de secondaire.

Théobald est agriculteur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de sollicite d’autre crédit pour renforcer son agriculture, utiliser des semences sélectionnées et des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. Dans les prochaines années, Théobald voudrait être le premier agriculteur dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Théobald is part of the Jyambere Muhinzi/Mrr/Bgrm group.  He is 25 years old, and is unmarried. He has six years of secondary education.

Théobald is a rice farmer.  This will be his first loan cycle with ACB.  He plans to use this loan to purchase fertilizer and pay for labour.

His strategy for the growth of his business is to use loans to reinforce his agriculture, to use improved seeds, and to use fertilizer in farming rice. In the coming years, Théobald would like to be the premier farmer in his region.  With the profits, he plans to provide education for his children.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay labour costs.

loans.name: Gbenonkpo Group

texts.fr: GBENONKPO est un groupement composé de quatorze personnes, et dont les membres résident dans le même quartier et mènent des activités génératrices de revenus. La représentante du groupement, Albertine (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 37 ans. Albertine est mariée à un cultivateur du nom de Houétokpo. Le couple a cinq enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Albertine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Albertine vend des céréales et de l’huile de palme de façon secondaire dans des régions du Bénin. Albertine s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans le but d’agrandir son activité pour être plus compétitive sur le marché, Albertine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement GBENONKPO, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
GBENONKPO is a group composed of fourteen persons whose members reside in the same district and who run revenue-generating businesses. 

The group's representative, Albertine (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 37 years old. She is married to a farmer named Houétokpo. They have five children, some of whom are in school. All the children are in their care. Albertine lives together with her husband and children. The couple jointly ensure the diverse household expenses are covered. 

To cope with her different expenses, Albertine sells grains, and palm oil on the side, in regions of Benin. She gets her supplies in Benin. 

With the goal of expanding her business to be more competitive in the market, Albertine, along with the other members of the group GBENONKPO, is requesting an initial loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy sacks of corn

loans.name: Safarali

texts.ru: Сафарали проживает в городе Куляб. Ему 32 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Он более восьми лет занимается торговлей. У него магазин со смешанным ассортиментом. Сафарали берет кредит для приобретения хозяйственных товаров.
texts.en: Safarali lives in the city of Kulob.  He is 32 years old, married and has three children.  He has been involved in sales for over eight years.  He has a store with a mixed variety of merchandise.  Safarali is requesting this loan to purchase household goods.

loans.use: to purchase household goods

loans.name: Jenny Elizabeth

texts.es:
Jenny, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertir en el negocio, logrando tener disponibilidad en productos comestibles, como boquitas, gaseosas, jugos, galletas, para surtir el negocio y poder tener más variado sus productos. 
Jenny ha tenido una experiencia buena del préstamo anterior, logrando mantener el negocio con variedad de mercaderia y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Jenny is asking for a new loan to invest in the business thereby having more availability of food items like snacks, soft-drinks, juice and cookies to stock the store and have a wider variety of products on hand.  Jenny has had a good experience with the previous loan managing to stay in business with a variety of merchandise thus improving her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy snacks, soft-drinks, juice and cookies.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
Catalina, esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para continuar mejorando y creciendo en sus ventas, su compra es en los materiales necesarios como maíz, leña y gas, que son los que le permiten mejorar la producción de tortillas para la clientela.
Ella considera que con el préstamo anterior logro mantenerse y hacer las tortillas para las personas que son clientes frecuentes, ayudándole para que su familia tuviera ingresos para su alimentación.
texts.en: Catalina is asking for a new loan to continue improving and growing in sales.  Her purchase consists in necessary supplies like corn, firewood and gas that are what allows her to improve tortilla production for her customers.  She believes that the previous loan made it possible for her to stay in business and make tortillas for people who are frequent customers which helped her family to be able to have income for their food.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood and gas.

loans.name: Darikhan

texts.ru: Дарихан 42 года. Дарихан работает техничкой и в качестве дополнительного источника дохода -  занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы 5,000 сом (KGS). В настоящее время в хозяйстве Дарихан имеется  5 овец,  и в целях покупки дополнительных голов, Дарихан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS).  Доходы от кредита Дарихан планирует вложить в увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Darikhan is 42 years old.  She works as a janitor and is involved in animal husbandry to provide a source of additional income.  She started this business with an initial amount of 5,000 som (KGS).  At the present time, Darikhan's business contains five sheep.  In order to buy additional heads of livestock, Darikhan requested a loan in the amount of 30,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Mahmadsaid

texts.ru: Махмадсаид проживает в районе Восеъ. Ему 28 лет. Он женат. У него восемь детей. Его отец тракторист, а мать и жена не работают. Сам Махмадсаид занимается животноводством и растениеводством. Он берет кредит для закупа телят и покупки семян и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Mahmadsaid lives in the Vose district.  He is 28 years old, married and has eight children.  His father is a tractor driver, and mother and wife do not work.  Mahmadsaid is involved in animal husbandry and agriculture.  He is requesting this loan to purchase calves, seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase calves, seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Jose Daniel

texts.es: José  es de la comarca la joya- Teustepe, tiene 37 años de edad, padre  tres hijos de 12, 10 y 3 años de edad quienes estudian su primaria y secundaria. El empezó   a trabajar a los 10 años de edad  al lado de sus hermanos  mayores, realizo sus estudios hasta  su primaria pero por falta de recurso  económico no pudo seguir estudiando, se dedica a la siembra de frijol y maíz. El cual comercializa dentro de su misma zona ya que es más seguro. Solicita el crédito para comprar la semilla de frijol  y  pagar el alquiler de la tierra donde sembrara este año, el  asegura  que con el préstamo podrá pagar la tierra con anticipación para la siembra del frijol y una vez que saque la cosecha poder pagar el crédito y la ganancia obtenida invertirla en unas terneras y mejorar la casa donde vive.
texts.en: José is a native of La Joya, a rural area in the municipality of Teustepe. He is 37 years old and he has 3 children aged 12, 10 and 3, two of whom go to school. He started working when he was 10 years old with his older brothers, and he completed primary school but was unable to continue studying because of economic difficulties. He engages in growing beans and maize, which he sells in the area where he lives because it is safer. He is requesting a loan to buy beans seeds and to pay rent for the land where her will plant this year. He guarantees that he will be able to pay in advance for the land where he will plant the beans and that he will be able to repay the loan with the crop he will harvest; he will invest the income he will earn in the purchase of some calves and in the improvement of the house where he lives.

loans.use: To buy beans seeds and to pay rent for his land.

loans.name: Elizabeth Del Carmen

texts.es:
Elizabeth, está solicitando un préstamo porque necesita surtir el negocio, comprara pantalones, ropa interior, con lo que espera tener mejoras en las ventas y que sus clientes sean mayormente atraídos para demandar de esta mercadería.
El préstamo anterior fortaleció aun más el negocio, invirtiéndolo en lo más necesario, ella ha tenido cambios en el negocio, porque instalo la venta de cocos, produciendo un ingreso más.
texts.en: Elizabeth’s asking for a loan because she needs to stock her business; she will buy pants and underwear that she hopes will improve sales and that her customers will feel more attracted to request this merchandise.  The previous loan strengthened the business even more investing in what was necessary.  She’s brought some changes to the business because she installed coconut sales producing additional income.

loans.use: to buy pants and underwear.

loans.name: Alibilal

texts.ru: Alibilal 51 letniy muj i u nego dvoe detey vozrastov 23 i 24. On upravlaet avtomasterskoy I rabotaet tam kak master. U nego 29 letniy staj v etoy sfere. Alibilal xochet kupit novie avtozapchasti i dla etogo emu nujna summa v 2000 AZN. Na budushee on planiruet radom s avtomasterskoy otkrit magazin s avtozapchastami I nanyat’ dvoix rabotnikov dla pomoshi.
texts.en: Alibilal is a 51 year-old husband, who has two children, ages 23 and 24.  He runs an auto repair shop and works there as a repairman.  He has 29 years of experience in this field.  Alibilal wants to purchase new automotive spare parts and needs an amount of 2000 AZN for this purpose.  In the future, he plans to open an auto parts store near his repair shop and hire two employees to help him.

loans.use: to purchase new automotive spare parts

loans.name: Melvin Leonel

texts.es: Melvin Leonel de 26 años de edad labora como docente de primaria en la colonia Rio Plata desde hace 7 años, es soltero no tiene hijos; esta solicitando su 2do credito para pagar curso de titulaciòn y comprar una computadora, como aun no tiene familia con su salario asume sus gastos personales y gastos de estudios, este cliente tambien trabaja en la finca de sus padres sembrando raices y tuberculos para obtener otros ingresos anuales, en su comunidad es muy conocido como una persona responsable y trabajadora y con muchos deseos de superacion.
texts.en: Melvin Leonel, 26, has been working as an elementary school teacher in the Río Plata neighborhood for 7 years.  He’s single and has no children.  He’s asking for his second loan to pay fees to legalize his professional degree and to buy a computer.  Since he still has no family he covers his personal and educational expenses with his salary.  He also works in his parents’ farm planting tubers and root vegetables to earn additional annual income.  He’s very well known in his community as a responsible, hardworking person who very much wants to improve.

loans.use: to pay fees to legalize his professional degree.

loans.name: Carlos Jose

texts.es: Don Carlos posee su propia empresa,es dueño de maquinaria agricola como es tractor y su implementos agricola, realizar preparaciòn de àreas mecanizada, siembra de cultivo tecnificado, solicita el 1er crèdito para compra de material de electricidad y poder realizar la instalacion del servicio de energia electrica en su casa de habitaciòn, su mayor ahnelo de ser beneficiado para poder habitar en su casa, pues actualmente carece de este servicio en su casa y esta alquilando un cuarto, y al hacer la instalacion se podria pasar a vivir a su propia vivienda. En su comunidad lo conocen por su buena conducta y muy trabajador.
texts.en: Carlos owns his business; he owns farming equipment like a tractor and other farming tools.  He does mechanized farmland preparation and technical planting.  He’s asking for his first loan to buy electrical supplies in order to install electricity at home.  His greatest wish is to be benefitted so that he can live in his house since it currently lacks this utility and he’s renting a room.  By doing this installation he will be able to move into and live in his own house.  He is well-known in his community for his good behavior and for being very hardworking.

loans.use: to install electricity.

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
Diana pertenece al banco comunal “Choquequirao” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y sus reuniones con sus compañeras del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco. 

La socia Diana alterna sus actividades diarias elaborando joyas en plata como aretes,pulseras y collares,la socia tiene su taller en su propio domicilio ella trabaja en este negocio conjuntamente con su hermano el cual le va bien ,a la vez la socia trabaja en una empresa privada durante el dia,la socia es una persona empeñosa y responsable siendo de esta manera que la socia sale adelante.

La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de materiales para elaborar las joyas en plata. 

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Diana belongs to the communal bank “Choquequirao” in the Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco.  She meets with her fellow group members every 30 days in the city of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco.  

Diana alternates her daily activities with her business making silver jewelry, such as earrings, bracelets and necklaces.  She has a workshop in her own house.  She works on this business together with her brother, and it is going well.  In addition, Diana works for a private company during the day.  Diana is a hardworking and responsible person, and in this manner she is getting ahead.

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies to make silver jewelry.

Diana appreciates and values this loan, and promises to comply with the monthly payment terms.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make silver jewelry

loans.name: Valeh

texts.ru: Valehu 50 let, on jenat u nego troe detey. Rabotaet Valeh masterom po remontu domov vot uje 29 let. Xochet nachat’ remont u seba doma i poetomu prosit 1300 AZN dla pokupki stroy materialov. Dengi za svoyu rabotu on poluchaet chastami i ne mojet pozvolit sebe kupit materiali srazu. Usloviya dla projivaniya doma ploxie, osobenno zimoy bivaet ochen xolodno. On sam budet delat remont I sozdast doma normalnie uslovia.
texts.en: Valeh is 50 years old, married and has three children.  Valeh has been working as a house-repair contractor for 29 years already.  He wants to start repairing his house and is requesting 1300 AZN to purchase construction materials for this purpose.  He earns money for his work in partial payments and cannot afford to buy construction materials all at once.  His home living conditions are bad and can get especially cold in the winter.  Valeh will do the repairs himself in order to create normal conditions at home.

loans.use: to repair the house

loans.name: Henrry

texts.es: Henry tiene 31 años de edad es soltero, su principal actividad es la de  prestar el servicio de taxista en un Radio móvil.  Tiene  automóvil propio , trabaja 6 días a la semana, él vive en la ciudad de  Cochabamba en la zona sud,  donde es  uno de los barrios más pobres de la ciudad, Henry vive aún vive en la casa de su padre mismo  no tiene garaje propio ya que dicha  vivienda se encuentra construida en una pendiente , motivo por el cual alquila parqueo todas las noches, la vivienda de sus padres es muy humilde con tan solo cuartos  la cual comparte con sus hermanos,   ayuda a pagar la mitad los gastos de electricidad y agua.  Su auto que se compró sin supervisión técnica es una marca  que sus costos de reparación  son los más altas,  mismo que ya presenta fallas mecánicas por el uso constante, el cual requiere mantenimiento, por lo tanto  el destino del crédito es el mantenimiento y reparación general de su vehículo.
texts.en: Henry is 31 years old and he is single. His mainly works as a taxi driver for a Radio Movil company. He has his own car and he works 6 days-a-week. He lives in the southern area of the town of Cochabamba, one of the poorest neighborhood of this town. Henry is still living in his parent’s house; he does not have a garage of his own because his parents’ house has been built on a slope, and for this reason he rents a parking lot every night. His parents’ house is very humble, and he shares a room with his brothers. He contributes to half of the electricity and water expenses. The brand of the car he has bought asks for the highest repair costs; since the car had not been technically checked when he bought it, and as it already shows mechanical flaws due to constant use, he needs to have it repaired; it is for this reason that the loan he is requesting will be used to pay for the maintenance works on and for the general repairs of his car.

loans.use: To pay for the maintenance of his car.

loans.name: Romania

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant,ella prepara desayunos,almuerzos y cenas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicta el credito para comprar mesas,sillas y tambien para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz,pollo,carne y verduras.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues to be dedicated to her restaurant business.  She prepares breakfasts, lunches and dinners.  She works from 8am until 8pm and through this business is able to support her children.  Her dream is to expand the restaurant business and is asking for a loan to buy tables and chairs and also to buy ingredients to cook like rice, chicken, meat and vegetables.  She is happy about the loan and committed to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs and also to buy ingredients to cook.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio, necesita nuevamente comprar insumos agrícolas por  eso a través de este préstamo comprara los materiales necesarios y pagara el arrendamiento del terreno.
El considera que el préstamo anterior fue un gran aporte que le ayudo para desarrollar el cultivo de maíz y frijol garantizándole los granos básicos para la alimentación de la familia así como para la venta de ellos.
texts.en:
Julio needs once again to buy farming supplies.  Through this loan he will buy the supplies that he needs, and will pay to rent some land.

Julio believes that his previous loan was a great contribution that helped him to develop his cultivations of corn and beans, guaranteeing him staple grains to feed his family and also to sell.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and to rent some land

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Khizmatali

texts.ru: Хизматали житель города Куляб. Возраст, 37 лет. Женат. Имеет восьмерых детей. Образование у него среднее. Хизматали занимается торговлей на рынке. Он занимается торговлей пять лет. Кредит берет для расширения своей деятельности и увеличения ассортимента товара.
texts.en: Khizmatali is a resident of the city of Kulob.  He is 37 years old, married and has eight children.  He has a secondary education.  Khizmatali is involved in sales at a market.  He has been in this business for five years.  He is requesting this loan to expand his business and the assortment of merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase carbonated beverages, candy, sugar, waffles, butter and coffee

loans.name: Ana Delis

texts.es:
Ana se a decidido por un nuevo préstamo para aumentar la mercadería en el negocio comprando fruta y verdura fresca como bananas, aguacates, tomates, papas, piña, papaya; con estas frutas espera generar mayores ventas logrando estabilizarse con el negocio.
Ella manifiesta haber mejorado su negocio y crecer dentro del mercado, aumentándole los ingresos para el consumo de la familia.
texts.en: Ana has decided to take a new loan so that she can get more merchandise for her business.  She will buy fresh fruits and vegetables such as: bananas, avocados, tomatoes, potatoes, pineapples, and papayas.  With this produce, she hopes to generate better sales so that she can stabilize her business.  Ana says that she's improved her business and is growing in the market, increasing her income for her family's consumption.

loans.use: to buy bananas, avocados, tomatoes, potatoes, pineapples, and papayas.

loans.name: Casiana

texts.es:
Casiana es socia del Banco Comunal “Santa Cruz de Acari”  ubicado en el distrito, provincia  Yunguyo y departamento de Puno, tiene 63 años de edad, es viuda y tiene 3 hijos independientes, la señora no cuenta con estudios.
 
Trabaja desde hace 6 años con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta de ají, productos de la región.

Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de  S/. 3,500.00 nuevo soles, dinero con la que comprará dos sacos de ají para luego venderlos en la localidad de Desaguadero, la mercadería lo compra en Tacna.  
En el negocio le ayuda su hija.

Su sueño para el futuro  es seguir operando en el negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  la facilidad del préstamo y lo que gana su ahorro.
texts.en:
Casiana is a member of “Santa Cruz de Acari”, a Communal Bank located in the district and province of Yunguyo in the Puno department. She is 63 years old, she is a widow, she did not go to school and she has 3 children who are economically independent.

She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 6 years. She requested a first loan of 300.00 PEN that she invested in her activity selling chili, a regional product.

She is currently requesting a loan of 3,500.00 PEN to buy bags of chili that she will then sell in the Desagaudero community. She buys her products in Tacna.

Her daughter helps her with her activity.

She dreams of being able to keep on running her activity in the future.

What she likes the most about her Communal Bank are what she gains thanks to her savings and how easy it is to obtain a loan.

loans.use: To buy bags of chili.

loans.name: Veronica Elizabeth

texts.es:
Verónica quiere comprar más mercadería para la elaboración de tortillas, comprando seis quintales de maíz y una carretada de leña que le permita mantenerse en la producción de las tortillas, para que sus clientes se mantengan satisfechos.
Ella considera que con el préstamo anterior logro aumentar su negocio y los clientes, dandole mayores ingresos economicos, su familia se encuentra estable.
texts.en:
Veronica wants to buy more supplies to make tortillas.  She will buy 6 quintals (100 pound bags) of corn and a cartload of firewood.  This will allow her to keep up her production of tortillas so that her customers will remain satisfied.

Veronica thinks that with her previous loan, she was able to expand her business and her customer base, giving her more income and providing her family with greater stability.

loans.use: to buy 6 quintals of corn and firewood

loans.name: Benjamin Rafael

texts.es:
Benjamín, solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de material y repuestos para una fotocopiadora, pagando el mantenimiento de estas herramientas y comprando papelería y útiles para ofrecer a los clientes y a los estudiantes en el negocio.
El manifiesta haber tenido un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior fortaleciendo su servicio a los clientes y logrando mantener las condiciones estables en su familia.
texts.en:
Benjamin is requesting a new loan to buy supplies and parts for a photocopier, to pay for the maintenance of these tools, and to buy stationery and school supplies to sell to his customers and to students in his business.

He states that his previous loan has had a positive effect by strengthening his customer service.  This has allowed him to maintain economic stability for his family.

loans.use: to buy stationery goods, school supplies and spare parts for his photocopier

loans.name: Fakhriddin

texts.ru: Фахриддин восемь лет занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Он женат на воспитании имеет трех несовершеннолетних детей. Жена помогает в бизнесе. Отходы от выращенных культур идут на корм скоту. Он хочет получить займ для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений и скота. Расширение бизнеса принесет еще большие доходы .На полученную прибыль Фахриддин мечтает отремонтировать свой дом. Он надеется на вашу помощь и уверен в вашей поддержке.
texts.en: Fakhriddin has been growing agricultural crops for eight years.  He is married and has three adolescent children.  His wife helps him with the business.  The leftovers from growing crops go toward feeding livestock.  He wants to obtain a loan to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers and livestock.  The expansion of business will yield even more income.  Fakhriddin dreams of using his profit to repair his house.  He relies on your help and is certain in your support.

loans.use: to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers and cattle

loans.name: Sonia Esperanza

texts.es:
Sonia necesita de más mercadería en su negocio por eso a través de este préstamo comprara especias como pimientas, achote, hojas de laurel, entre otras, para mantener surtido el negocio para poder atender a los clientes y aumentar las ventas, ya que a parte de verduras, esta ofreciendo condimento de cocina.
El préstamo le ayudo a dar estabilidad al negocio manteniéndose dentro del mercado también ha estabilizado las condiciones económicas de su familia.
texts.en:
Sonia needs more merchandise for her business.  For this reason she will use this loan to purchase spices such as peppers, achote, and laurel leaves among other things, to keep her business stocked so that she can serve her customers and grow her sales, as in addition to vegetables, she sells cooking spices.

The loan will help her to give her business stability by remaining in the market.  She will also have stabilized her family's financial situation.

loans.use: to purchase spices such as peppers, achote, and laurel leaves.

loans.name: Celina Miladys

texts.es:
Celina, se dedica a la crianza de pollos, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, ella inicio el negocio por que aprendió de un cuñado el trabajo que se necesita realizar, y como una fuente de ingresos para apoyar a su esposo en las obligaciones del hogar.
Ella comprara pollos, concentrado y vitaminas, para la granja, con esto podrá mejorar y crecer el número de animales, tambien podrá suministrarles lo necesario en alimento y medicinas para cubrir cualquier riesgo en el negocio. 
La aspiración de Celina es que a través de los préstamos pueda sostenerse y mejorar la granja, dándole la oportunidad de mejorar los ingreses para la familia.
texts.en:
Celina works raising chickens.  She lives with her husband and three children. She began her business because she learned how to do the work that she needed to do from her brother-in-law, and it's a source of income to support her husband in the household obligations.

She will purchase chickens, extract and vitamins for her farmyard.  With this she will be able to improve and grow the number of her poultry.  She will also be able to administer the necessary food and medicines to them, so as to cover any risks to her business.

Celina's aspiration is that through the loans, she will be able to support herself and improve her farmyard, providing the opportunity to improve her family's income.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, extract and vitamins for her farmyard.

loans.name: Kossivi

texts.fr:
Kossivi est un homme âgé de 29 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a 01 enfant de 05ans scolarisé.
Kossivi travaille comme tailleur et revendeur de tissus depuis 2009. Il a un atelier dans lequel il répond à la demande de ses nombreux clients et travaille avec 12 apprentis. 
Kossivi a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des tissus. Il veut réaménager son atelier en agrandissant la taille.
Dans les prochaines années, Kossivi voudrait assurer l’éducation de son enfant et quitter plus tard la maison familiale.
texts.en: Kossivi is a 29 year old man who is married to a re-seller of goods. He has one 5 year old who attends school. Kossivi has been working as tailor and re-seller of cloth since 2009. He has a workshop to meet customer requests and works with 12 apprentices. Kossivi is asking for his first loan from WAGES in order to purchase more cloth. He would like to re-model his workshop, notably by making it larger in size. In the coming years, Kossivi would like to ensure his child is able to continue attending school and would also like to leave the family home/compound.

loans.use: purchase cloth in order to make clothes

loans.name: Segundo Oswaldo Rochina Gaglay

texts.es:
Segundo Oswaldo tiene 32 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Segundo es trabaja haciendo carreras, tiene un taxi el es chofer. Solicita el crédito para comprar una moto. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprarse la moto que le servirá de mucho para poder trabajar como mensajero y obtener otros ingresos.

La compra lo hará en Ventanas. El sueño es poder tener una casa pequeña con jardín. 

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son el vivir día a día y enfrentarce a muchos retos. En el tiempo libre le gusta ir de caminata
texts.en:
Segundo Oswaldo is 32 years old, unmarried and does not have children. He lives with his parents in Ventanas in Los Rios Province.

Segundo’s work is driving. He has a taxi and is a driver. He is applying for a loan in order to buy a motorcycle.

With the help of a loan he will be able to buy a motorcycle that will enable him to work as a messenger and earn additional income. He will buy it in Ventanas. 

His dream is to own a small house with a garden.

The challenges he faces are living day to day and confronting many trials. In his spare time he enjoys walking.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Francis Jeanethe Fornos Espinoza

texts.es: Francis Jeanethe tiene 33 años de edad, su actividad a la que se dedica es a la venta de mercadería en general esta actividad la realiza de forma ambulante visitando a su clientes en sus domicilios donde habitan. Francis tiene a su cargo dos hijos que todavía están estudiando, el mayor sueño de la emprendedora es que  sus hijos culminen sus estudios y que su negocio crezca cada día teniendo siempre mercadería para sus clientes cuando le soliciten. Francis Jeanethe esta solicitando financiamiento para comprar mercadería como pantalones, camisas, blusas, cosméticos, faldas, blúmer entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Francis Jeanethe is 33 years old.  The business that she works in is selling general merchandise, which she does as a street vendor, visiting her customers in their homes.  Francis has two children she is responsible for, who are still attending school.  The entrepreneur's greatest dream is that her children will finish their studies and that her business will grow on a daily basis, as she will always have merchandise for her customers when they request it.

Francis Jeanethe is requesting financing to purchase merchandise such as trousers, shirts, blouses, cosmetics, skirts, and underwear among other items.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as trousers, shirts, blouses, cosmetics, skirts, and underwear among other items.

loans.name: Guillermo Antonio

texts.es:
Guillermo, vive con sus padres y hermanos, está soltero, se dedica a la venta de semilla de marañón, con este negocio logra mantenerse y aportar para su familia algunos ingreso, él no tiene un horario establecido.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de semilla de marañón cruda, para procesarla y mantenerla lista para la venta, esta inversión le ayudara para continuar proveyendo lo necesario en su vida personal y tambien contribuir con su familia.
Él aspira crecer en el negocio, poder a través de los préstamos tener una mejor condición y ofrecerla a su familia.
texts.en:
Guillermo lives with his parents and brothers.  He is single, and works selling cashews.  With this business, he has been able to support himself and contribute some income to his family.  He doesn't have a fixed work schedule.

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of raw cashews, so that he can process them and keep them ready for sale.  This investment will help him to continue providing what he needs in his personal life, and also contribute to his family.

He hopes to grow his business, and through the loans to be able to have better living conditions and provide the same for his family.

loans.use: to purchase raw cashews.

loans.name: Jean Jacques

texts.fr:
Client de 49 ans, marie et père de 3 enfants dont tous sont scolarises, il ouvre un bar  il y'a de cela 11 ans. pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.Il a deja bénéficié de 3 cycles de prêts et ceux ci  lui ont permis  d'agrandir son activité et d'améliorer ses conditions de son travail.
 
Sa buvette est très populaire et il a une forte clientèle cela est du par la qualité de services fournis aux clients et il est très aimable avec ses clients.
Avec ce nouveau prêt, il va renforcer le stock des chaises et tables en plastiques et aussi repeindre sa buvette pour plus d'attraction.
Il a des grandes stratégies pour améliorer la qualité ses recettes, et il épargne beaucoup et rembourse sans difficultés.
Il a pour ambition d'ouvrir une nouvelle buvette dans un autre quartier et en tant que bon père de famille il s'occupe valablement de sa famille
texts.en:
This borrower is a 49-year-old married man and father of three children who all go to school. He opened a refreshment bar eleven years ago to support his family. He has previously obtained three loans that allowed him to expand his business and improve his working conditions. 

His bar is very popular and he has a great customer base due to the quality of his services. He is very nice to his customers. 

With this new loan, he plans to strengthen his stock of plastic tables and chairs and give the place a fresh coat of paint to make it more appealing. 

He has great business strategies to bolster his revenue. He saves his money and has no difficulty making repayments. 

His goal is to open another bar in a different district. He is a good provider who takes care of his family.

loans.use: to strengthen his stock of plastic tables and chairs and paint his bar

loans.name: Haja Kadijatu

texts.en: This is 29-year-old Haja Kadijatu. She is married to a police officer and has one child, aged 1 year, 3 months. In 2003, Haja Kadijatu established her local foodstuffs business. She began her business because when she was going to school at the age of 15 she got pregnant, and her parents asked her to leave the house, so she went to stay with her husband. After she gave birth, she lost the baby and by then the husband was in college. Things were difficult and she decided to go into business to keep up the house. Working seven days a week and eight hours a day, she earns about Le 700,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. Haja Kadijatu is requesting the loan in order to buy 20 bags of groundnuts @ Le. 100,000 and 2 bags of beans @ Le. 400,000 and to pay for transport. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le. 500,000. In the future, Haja Kadijatu plans to open an outlet for her sister and also to assist her husband to buy a piece of land to construct a house.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy 20 bags of groundnuts @ Le. 100,000 and 2 bags of beans @ Le. 400,000 and pay for transport

loans.name: Mkubwa

texts.en:
Mkubwa is a 58-year-old married man. He has five children and three are enrolled in school. 

Mkubwa operates a coffee business, selling at the market to his neighbours. He has worked in this business for ten years. His primary customers are villagers. He describes his greatest business challenge to be credit sales and his highest monthly expense is food. He owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Mkubwa will use the KES 10,000 loan to purchase two coffee kettles for use in his cafe business. 

Mkubwa aspires to open a restaurant in the future. He joined Yehu because of its loan products and policies.

loans.use: to purchase two coffee kettles for use in his cafe business.

loans.name: Tanios

texts.en:
Tanios is a 33-year-old Lebanese single man. He is living alone and wishes to have his own family and children. 

Tanios works independently as an electrician and has been involved in this domain since 2002. Today, he wants to borrow a loan from Kiva Partner, Ameen s.a.l., to renew his electrical tools. This will speed up his work and therefore allow him to earn superior income. 

In the future, he plans to take bigger projects outside the country.

loans.use: to renew his electrical tools.

loans.name: Adama

texts.en:
This is 40-year-old Adama. She is married and has no children. She only has 2 dependents who assist her in doing business. 

In 1998, Adama established her aluminium utensils and baby clothing materials. She started doing business with her mother and after her mother died, at the age of 25, she took control over the business full because she was the only child that was assisting her while others were going to school. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about 1,500,000 SLL every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. Adama requires a loan in order to buy 20 sets of cooking stoves @ 80,000, 9 cartons of pampers @ 150,000 and  to pay for transport. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 963,000 SLL. 

In the future, Adama plans to extend the business and rent a shop. She is hardworking and very dedicated to business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy cooking stoves and pampers and to pay for transport.

loans.name: Adama

texts.en:
Meet 48-year-old Adama from Krootown Central area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. She is married with four children between the ages of 20 years and 32 years. Two of her children are currently attending school. In 2002, Adama established her general merchandise business. She began her business because she needed a permanent source of income to support her children; she also receives income from her sister who lives abroad. She works at the business six days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is rapid inflation in Sierra Leone.

Adama requires a loan in order to buy more clothes for men and women, perfume, soft drinks, cream and shower gel. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to improve her family's standard of living. In the future, Adama plans to build a big house. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more  clothes for men and women, perfume, soft drinks, cream and shower gel

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
This is 40-year-old Hannah. She is married and has one child, aged seven years. She has three additional dependents living with her because of schooling. 

In 2002, Hannah established her palm oil business. She began her business because there was no one to pay for her school fees. Working seven days a week and twelve hours a day, she earns about Le 1,100,000 every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. Hannah requires a loan in order to buy a large quantity of palm oil. 
In the future, Hannah plans to build her own house to live in with her family. She is thanking you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Irma

texts.en:
Irma is 42 years old. She lives in a small village of Gori District, East Georgia, with her family: husband, Tamaz, 16-year-old daughter, and 6-year-old son. The children go to school. 

The family earns a living through the agricultural business. They have a dairy farm with three milk cows. Irma produces cheese and sells on average 60 kg of this product to local dairy products retailers. Along with the dairy farm, the family owns six hectares of agricultural land, where they grow wheat, maize, haricot (beans), tomatoes, and cabbage. On the same plot the family grows 400 apple trees, but they are too young and don’t give fruit. Irma and Tamaz sell harvested vegetables locally to greengrocery retailers. The total average monthly income of the family equals to 1,500 Laris.

Irma requested credit for purchasing additional agricultural land. She will use it for vegetable growing. She will harvest more vegetables and get more income from sales. 

Irma plans to use the increase in income for renovation of the family’s house, which is old and needs some repair.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural land.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed is 60 years old and married with 3 children, aged 26 years and 32 years. He runs a used clothing store in Tengbeh Town, western area in Freetown, Sierra Leone.

He's been in this business for 20 years and sells carpet and different types of used clothes. He also earns income from renting out a house. He says that the main challenge to his business is low capital to invest in his business.

He requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to buy more bed room carpets, bed sheets, pillow cases and window cotton. He says that the extra income from this loan will help him to raise enough money to maintain his home. In the future, he would like to have a permanent shop structure. He is grateful for your support.

loans.use: To buy more bed room carpets, bed sheets, and pillow cases.

loans.name: Khoder

texts.en: Khoder is a 47-year-old married Lebanese man. He lives with his wife and two children, one of whom is working. He is the one responsible for his family and seeking to offer them a better future. Khoder has owned a library in addition to a mini-market for the past three years. Today, he is requesting a loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase some books for his library and groceries for his mini-market. This will definitely increase his revenues and his earnings. In the future, he plans to open his own supermarket.

loans.use: to purchase books for his library and groceries for his mini-market

loans.name: Houenoussou Group

texts.fr: HOUENOUSSOU est un groupe composé de six personnes qui résident dans la même localité. La représentante du groupe du nom de Joceline (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 37 ans. Joceline est une veuve et mère de quatre enfants, tous scolarisés. Joceline vit seule avec ses enfants et assure seule leurs différentes charges.  Joceline n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Joceline mène comme activité la vente de produits de quincaillerie et de produits vivriers dans une région du Bénin. Joceline exerce cette activité depuis huit ans et s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle de plus en plus nombreuses et de se faire plus de profit, Joceline sollicite ensemble avec les autres  membres du groupe HOUENOUSSOU un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
HOUENOUSSOU is a group composed of six persons who reside in the same town. The group's representative, Joceline (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 37 years old. She is a widow and the mother of four children, all in school. Joceline lives alone with her children and covers their different expenses by herself.  

Joceline did not attend school. To cope with supporting herself, she sells hardware and food supplies in a region in Benin. She has been in this business for eight years and gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

With the goal of responding better to the requirements of her burgeoning customer base and to make more profit, Joceline, along with the other members of the group HOUENOUSSOU, is requesting a third loan from ALIDé. The previously received loans were indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy hardware goods and food provisions

loans.name: Hassan Dassi

texts.en:
Hassan is a 36-year-old married man. He has 6 children and all are enrolled in school. His wife's name is Zena, and she works as a businesswoman. Hassan operates a retail business and sells his goods in a shop. He's worked in this business for 2 years. His primary customers are villagers. He describes his greatest business challenge to be fluctuations of market prices, and his highest monthly expense is food. He owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Hassan will use the Kes 30,000 loan to purchase bags of sugar, rice, cooking oil and flour. Hassan aspires to open a wholesale business in the future. He joined Yehu because of low interest rates and good public relations.

loans.use: to purchase bags of sugar, rice, cooking oil and flour.

loans.name: Alfred Alpha

texts.en: This is 27 year-old Alfred.  He is married, and has 1 child, aged 8months. In 2010, Alfred established his provision business. He began his business because there was no one to pay school fees for him. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about Le 950,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. Alfred requires a loan in order to buy more stock. In the future, Alfred plans to open another outlet to be managed by his wife.  He is thanking you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more provisions for his business

loans.name: Naziha

texts.en: Naziha is a 52-year-old Lebanese divorced woman living with her son. After her divorce, she had to start her business working as curtain tailor to be able to have enough money to pay the high costs of living. Her shop is situated in her town; she is a friendly woman and has her loyal customers. Today, she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner, Ameen s.a.l, to purchase textiles in good quantities with low prices. In the future, she plans to hire a part-time employee to work on her behalf, as she is becoming older and needs to take a break.

loans.use: to purchase textiles in good quantities with low prices

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohamad is a 56-year-old married man from Lebanon. He lives with his wife and two children. Mohamad has been selling newspapers and books since 1992. He works on a freelance basis. Today, he is asking for a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase additional books and newspapers. These purchases will allow him to increase his sales by a large percentage which will allow him earn higher profits. In the future, he plans to ask for more Kiva loans in order to consistently support his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional books and newspapers

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes y tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de artesania,ella vende gorros,chompas y pantalones,por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de artesania y tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar chompas,guantes y pantalones y tambien comprar productos para implementar la tienda de abarrotes como arroz,azucar,leche y aceite.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This associate continues working in the grocery store business and also continues dedicating herself to the business of handicrafts.  She sells caps, sweaters and pants.  Through these businesses the associate gets her kids ahead.  Her dream is to grow the business selling handicrafts and groceries.  She is asking for credit in order to purchase sweaters, gloves and pants and also to buy products to stock the grocery store like rice, sugar, milk and oil.  

She is happy for the loan and promises to complete all of the loan payments.

loans.use: To purchase sweaters, gloves and pants and also to buy products to supply a grocery store like rice, sugar, milk and oil.

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es:
María, quiere seguir trabajando y mantener su negocio competente, por eso está solicitando un nuevo préstamo e invertirlo en artículos de bisutería y materiales para la elaboración de esta, comprándose hilo, piedras de diferentes colores, broches,  dijes, entre otros productos necesarios para que su producción siga creciendo. 
Ella ha crecido en el negocio, ahora sus ventas son mayores, después de la inversión de su primer préstamo, esto le ha ayudado tambien a generar más ingresos para la familia.
texts.en:
María wants to continue working and to maintain her business competently.  For this reason she is asking for a new loan and to invest it in imitation jewelry and materials for making jewelry, like thread, stones of different colors, broaches, beads, among other necessary products so that her production will continue to grow. 

She has grown the business, which now has higher sales, since the investment of her first loan.  This has helped her also generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase imitation jewelry and materials for making jewelry, like thread, stones of different colors, broaches, and beads

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura,ella cultiva maiz y luego lo vende en las diferentes ferias,la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es mejorar su terreno de cultivo.La socia solicita el credito para comprar abonos y semillas para su tierras de cultivos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The associate continues working in the agricultural business.  She raises corn and then sells it in different markets.  By means of this business the associate helps her children get ahead.  Her dream is to improve the land that she cultivates.  She is asking for credit in order to purchase fertilizer and seeds for her fields.  

She is happy for the loan and promises to complete all of her loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seeds for her fields.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Maputo, Província de mesmo nome, Sul de Moçambique, casado e pai de 5 filhos dos quais 4 ainda frequentam a Escola. Fez a 12ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 

Trabalha como funcionário no ministerio da desfesa nacional há mais de28 anos e tem um salário de 8.338.00.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Já teve empréstimo no BIM no valor de 50.000.00mt para habitação e pagou sem dificuldades, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 25.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (areia, pedra, cimento, barrotes, ferro, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 23.678.00mt, e 18.000.00mt,aplicados na habitação. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e continuar com os estudos, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos.
texts.en:
Tomas was born in the city of Maputo in the province of the same name in southern Mozambique.  His is married and is the father of 5 children, 4 of whom are in school.  He finished studying through the 12th grade and stopped due to his parents' lack of financial resources.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them. 

He has been an employee in the National Ministry of Defense for more than 28 years and has a salary of 8,338 meticals, which he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also save some in his bank account at the BIM bank.

He has already had a loan with the BIM bank for 50,000 meticals, which he paid back without any problem.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is his third loan with Hluvuku, and it is for 25,000 meticals.  He will use it to buy construction materials for his home (sand, rock, cement, beams, iron, etc.).  His previous loans were for 23,678 and 18,000 meticals, which he also put towards his home.

He promises to make his payments on time.  In the future, he plans to finish his home and continue with his studies, for which he is planning on requesting more loans.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his house (sand, rock, cement, beams, iron, etc.)

loans.name: Selemane

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Província de Nampula, Norte de Moçambique, casado e pai de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Fez a 8ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a irmã e o sobrinho que vivem com ele. 
	

Saiu de Nampula para Maputo no distrito de Boane em missão de serviço, é pensionista desmobilizado há mais de 20 anos e tem uma pensão de 5.000.00.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária.

Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu quinto empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (pedra, cimento, barrotes, ferro, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 15.000.00mt, 15.000.00mt, 18.000.00mt, e 18.500.00mt, aplicados na habitação. 

Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e fazer crescer o seu negócio, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Selemane was born in the province of Nampula in northern Mozambique.  He is married and is the father of 3 children, all of whom go to school.  He studied through the 8th grade and stopped due to his parents' lack of financial resources.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports his sister and nephew, who live with him.

He left Nampula for Maputo in the district of Boane on a mission with the military.  He has been demobilized and has received a pension for more than 20 years.  His pension is 5,000 meticals, which he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also saves some in his bank account.	

He has never had a loan with another bank.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is his fifth loan with Hluvuku, and it is for 20,000 meticals.  He will use it to buy construction materials for his home (rock, cement, beams, iron, etc.).  His previous loans were for 15,000, 15,000, 18,000, and 18,500, and all were applied to his home.

He promises to make his payments on time.  In the future, he plans to finish his house and grow his business, for which he is planning on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his home (rock, cement, beams, iron, etc.)

loans.name: Rosa

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, casada e mãe de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Fez a Licenciatura como professora e parou por falta de tempo, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 2 sobrinhos que vivem com ela. 
	

 É professora há mais de 12 anos e tem um salário de 10.500.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Já teve empréstimo no BIM no montante de 50.000.00mt e conseguiu pagar sem dificuldades, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 18.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (areia, cimento, ferro, pedra, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 17.000.00mt, e 23.412.00mt, aplicados na habitação. 

Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende comprar uma viatura, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Rosa was born in the district of Boane in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  She is married and is the mother of 2 children, who are in school.  She started her degree in teaching but stopped due to lack of time.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports 2 nephews who live with her.

She has been a teacher for more than 12 years and has a salary of 10,500 meticals, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account in the BIM bank.

She has already had a loan with the BIM bank in the amount of 50,000 meticals, which she managed to pay back without any problems.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is her third loan, and it is for 18,000 meticals.  She will use it to buy construction materials for her home (sand, cement, iron, rock, etc.).  Her previous loans were for 17,000 and 23,412 meticals, which she put towards her home.

She promises to make her payments on time.  In the future, she hopes to buy a vehicle, for which she is planning on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for her home (sand, cement, iron, rock, etc).

loans.name: Juan Angel

texts.es:
Juan, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de mercadería para la tienda, invirtiendo en aceite, pastas, huevos, embutidos, refrescos artificiales, todo para mantener una buena cantidad de productos para la venta.
Él manifiesta haber tenido una buena experiencia con el préstamo anterior, aumentado el inventario y manteniendo a sus clientes bien atendidos, para seguir generando buenas ventas.
texts.en: Juan is asking for a new loan in order to purchase merchandise for his store, investing in oil, pasta, eggs, sausages, and sodas, all in order to maintain a better quantity of products for sale.  He says he had a good experience with the previous loan, increasing inventory and keeping his clients well attended, in order to continue generating good sales.

loans.use: To purchase oil, pasta, eggs, sausages, and sodas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials like thread in different colors, silk and nylon

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
Nasceu no distrito de Chibuto, Província de Gaza, Sul de Moçambique, solteira e mãe de 3 filhos dos quais 2 frequentam a Escola e o outro ainda não tem idade escolar. Fez a 10ª classe, se formou como professora e parou de estudar por falta de tempo, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta os pais enviando dinheiro para ajudar nas despesas alimentares. 
	

Saiu de Chibuto para Maputo no distrito de Boane em missão de serviço, é professora há mais de 29 anos e tem um salário de 10.200.00.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Já teve empréstimo no BIM e conseguiu pagar sem dificuldades, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu quinto empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (ferro, areia, pedra, cimento, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 8.000.00mt, 10.000.00mt, 15.000.00mt, e 17.000.00mt, aplicados na habitação. 

Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e comprar uma viatura, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
She was born in the district of Chibuto, province of Gaza, southern Mozambique. She's single and has three children - two of them attend school, the other one hasn't yet reached school age. She completed 10th grade, graduated as a teacher and stopped studying due to lack of time. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports her parents by sending money to help with food expenses.
She left Chibuto for Maputo, in the district of Boane, on a work assignment. She has been a teacher for over 29 years and earns a salary of 10.200mt. She uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in her bank account.
She has had a loan with BIM and managed to repay it without difficulties. She first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her 5th loan with Hluvuku. It is for 20.000mt, which she intends to use to purchase construction supplies in order to build her house (iron, sand, rocks, cement, etc). The previous loans were for 8.000mt, 10.000mt, 15.000mt and 17.000mt, for housing expenses.
She pledges to make her repayments as scheduled. In the future she intends to finish building her home and to purchase a vehicle. For that purpose she plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies in order to build her home (iron, sand, rocks, cement, etc.).

loans.name: Luisa

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Cidade de Maputo, Província de mesmo nome, Sul de Moçambique, casada e mãe de 4 filhos todos quais frequentam a Escola. Fez a 6ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seu sobrinho que vive com ela. 

É funcionaria da CONTIMOL há mais de 6 anos e tem um salário de 2.500.00.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária.

Já teve empréstimo no SOCREMO no valor de 5.000.00mt e conseguiu pagar sem dificuldades, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu quinto empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar bens de consumo para a sua casa (congelador, material eléctrico, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 6.000.00mt, 11.000.00mt, 22.812.000.00mt, e 31.048.00mt, aplicados na habitação. 

Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e mobilar, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Luisa was born in the city of Maputo in the province of the same name in southern Mozambique.  She is married and is the mother of 4 children, all of whom go to school.  She studied through the 6th grade and didn't continue due to her parents' lack of financial resources.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her nephew, who lives with her.

She has been an employee of Contimol for more than 6 years.  She has a salary of 2,500 meticals, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account. 

She has already had a loan with Socremo for 5,000 meticals, which she managed to pay back without any problems.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is her fifth loan with Hluvuku, and it is for 20,000 meticals.  She will use it to buy products for her home (a freezer, electrical materials, etc.).  Her previous loans were for 6,000, 11,000, 22,812, and 31,048 meticals.  She put them all towards her home.

She promises to make her payments on time, and in the future she hopes to finish her home and furnish it, for which she is planning on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy products for her home (a freezer, electrical materials, etc.)

loans.name: Ana Claribel

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a la venta de ropa, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, su negocio inicio por iniciativa propia, trabaja de forma ambulante, no tiene un horario establecido, cuenta con experiencia para manejar las ventas.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa variada, que sea nueva, para diversificar lo que ofrece a los clientes, comprara blusas, faldas, pantalones, entre otros productos que son necesarios.
La aspiración de Ana es que su familia cuente con una fuente de ingreso, ya que su trabajo le permite garantizarles a ellos la alimentación y cualquier necesidad que solventar.
texts.en:
Ana works selling clothing and lives with her husband and two children.  Her business began through her own initiative.  She works as a walking salesperson and does not have an established schedule.  She counts on experience in order to manage sales.  

She is asking for a loan in order to purchase varied clothing, that is new, in order to diversify what she offers to her clients.  She will buy blouses, skirts, pants, and other necessary products.

Ana's aspiration is that her family will be able to count on a source of income, since her work permits her to guarantee them food and other needs that they have.

loans.use: To buy blouses, skirts, and pants

loans.name: Sonia

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Cidade de Maputo, Província de mesmo nome, Sul de Moçambique, solteira e mãe de 3 filhos todos quais frequentam a Escola. Fez a 5ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 
	

É negociante há mais de 12 anos dedica-se a compra e revenda de produtos alimentares e tem um rendimento de cerca de 5.000.00.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária.

Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu segundo empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (blocos, areia, pedra, cimento, e outros). O empréstimo anterior foi de 20.000.00mt, aplicado na habitação. 

Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e mobilar, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
She was born in the town of Maputo, province of the same name, southern Mozambique. She's single and has three children, all of which attend school. She completed 5th grade and stopped because her parents lacked financial conditions. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She has been a businesswoman for over 12 years. She buys and sells foodstuffs and earns an income of about 5.000mt. She uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in her bank account.
She has never had loans in other banks. She first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her second loan with Hluvuku. It is for 20.000mt, which she intends to use to purchase construction supplies in order to build her house (bricks, sand, rocks, cement, etc). The previous loan was for 20.000mt, for housing expenses.
She pledges to make her repayments as scheduled. In the future she intends to finish building and furnishing her home, and for that purpose she plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies in order to build her house (bricks, sand, rocks, cement, etc.).

loans.name: Isaura

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, solteira e mãe de 1 filho ainda bebe. Fez o Ensino Superior e parou por falta de tempo, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta os pais que vivem com ela. 
	

 É professora há mais de 14 anos na Escola do Gaiato e tem um salário de 21.800.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Já teve empréstimo no BIM e conseguiu pagar sem dificuldades, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 17.500.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (portas, areia, cimento, ferro, pedra, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 9.500.00mt, e 15.000.00mt, aplicados na habitação. 

Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Isaura was born in the district of Boane, in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  She is a single mother and has one son, who is still a baby.  She started college but stopped due to lack of time.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her parents, who live with her.

She has been a teacher for more than 14 years at the Gaiato School.  She has a salary of 21,800 meticals, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account.

She has already had a loan through the BIM bank, which she managed to pay back without any problems.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is her third loan with Hluvuku, and it is for 17,500 meticals.  She will use it to buy construction materials for her home (doors, sand, cement, iron, rock, etc.).  Her other loans were for 9,500 and 15,000 meticals, which she put towards her home.

She promises to make her payments on time.  In the future, she wants to finish her home, for which she is planning on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for her home (doors, sand, cement, iron, rock, etc.)

loans.name: Rosa Patricia

texts.es:
Rosa, vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y  tres hermanos, de quienes dos  trabajan,  ella administra una tienda de productos domésticos, atendiendo a la zona donde reside, su horario es de 6:00am a 9:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos para surtir el negocio, como azúcar, frijoles, arroz, aceite, pastas, pan, esto lo necesitara para mantener a la clientela bien atendida, para asegurar su preferencia.
La aspiración de Rosa es que su tienda crezca, abasteciendo de lo necesario a la zona,  que sus hijos crezcan en mejores condiciones y mayor solvencia económica.
texts.en: Rosa lives in her own home with her two children and three siblings, two of whom work.  She runs a household products store, serving the zone where she lives.  Her hours are from 6am to 9pm.  She is asking for a loan in order to purchase products to supply her business, like sugar, beans, rice, oil, pasta, and bread.  She needs this in order to keep her customers well served and to assure their preferences.  Rosa's aspiration is that her store will grow, supplying the zone as necessary, and that her children will grow up in better conditions and with better economic security.

loans.use: To purchase sugar, beans, rice, oil, pasta, and bread.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, solteira e mãe de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Fez a 7ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte de seus pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 
	

 É negociante há mais de 8 anos dedica-se a compra e venda de carne e tem um rendimento de cerca de 4.500.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 17.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar diversos tipos de carne para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria (carne de vaca, de porco, peru, frango, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 11.000.00mt, e 17.000.00mt, aplicados no negócio. 

Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende melhorar as condições da sua residência, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
She was born in the district of Boane, province of Maputo, southern Mozambique. She's single and has two children, both of which attend school. She completed 7th grade and stopped because her parents lacked financial conditions. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She has been a businesswoman for over eight years. She buys and sells meat and earns an income of about 4.500mt. She uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in her bank account.
She has never had loans in other banks. She first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her third loan with Hluvuku. It is for 17.000mt, which she intends to use to purchase various types of meat in order to increase the quantity of her merchandise (beef, pork, turkey, chicken, etc.). The previous loans were for 11.000mt and 17.000mt, for her business.
She pledges to make her repayments as scheduled. In the future she intends to make home improvements, and for that purpose she plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase meat for selling (beef, pork, turkey, chicken, etc.).

loans.name: Martha Georgina

texts.es: Doña Martha R. una mujer emprendedora, la cual tiene como oficio la agricultura, desde hace un tiempo que se dedica a la siembra de tomates y chiltomas, gracias a la bendicion de contar con unas tierras. Mismas que han sido el sosten para que su economia sea mas fluida en estos ultimos años. Con este financiamiento su proyecto es continuar invertirdiendole en el manteniemiento adecuado de sus tierras con abonos, semillas, venenos y otros; obteniendo de esta manera una buena cosecha y de paso aprovechar las primeras lluvias de la temporada de invierno que sin duda alguna le ayudaran en gran manera para que su siembra sea todo un éxito. Su gran sueño es seguir mejorando dia dia sus condicones de vida.
texts.en: Martha R. is an enterprising woman whose occupation is farming.  She’s been growing tomatoes and peppers for some time thanks to the blessing of owning farmland which has been the support for a more fluid economy in the last few years.  With this loan she plans to invest in adequate crop maintenance; she will buy manure, seeds, poisons and others thus obtaining a good harvest and at the same time take advantage of the first rains of the winter season which without a doubt will help her quite a bit so that her crops will be a complete success.  Her dream is to continue improving her living conditions day by day.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Casimira

texts.es:
La Señora Casimira es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Floreciendo, vive por la parroquia del Valle que es conocida también como “San Bautista de El Valle”, se encuentra  situada al sureste de Cuenca, parroquia que tiene atractivos como la laguna de Cochapamba (llenas de totoras), su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y la agricultura, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Casimira tiene 63 años, es divorciada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 10 hijos, todos sus hijos son casados y nueve de ellos viven independientes, solo una hija vive en su casa con quien comparte los gastos del hogar. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

La Señora Casimira se dedica a la cría de conejos, cuyes, cerdos, borregos y gallinas, también labora en la agricultura, siembra verduras y  luego las vende en un puesto que tiene en un mercado de la ciudad. 

En el banco comunal se encuentra hace 15 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos, gallinas y granos tiernos para agrandar su negocio.
 
Sus metas son mejorar su casa y llegar a tener una tienda.
texts.en:
Casimira is a member of the “Mujeres Floreciendo” (Flourishing Women) communal bank.  She lives in El Valle Parish which is also known as “San Juan de El Valle” and is located southeast of Cuenca.  The parish has attractions like Cochapamba Lagoon (full of reeds).  Its residents are merchants, raise animals and farm; they preserve the culture and traditions of its peoples.

Casimira is 63 years old, divorced and had ten children; all of her children are married and nine of them live independently, only one daughter lives at home and shares household expenses with her.  The house she lives in is her property.

Casimira raises rabbits, guinea pigs, pigs, sheep and chickens.  She also farms vegetables that she then sells in a stand she has in the city’s market.

She’s been in the communal bank for 15 years and will use her new loan to buy pigs, chickens and fresh grains to expand her business.  Her goals are to do some home improvements and to have a store.

loans.use: to buy pigs, chickens and fresh grains.
